title: EmuDeck Gaming Mode
description:
Now you can update or customize EmuDeck directly in Gaming Mode, no need to go into Desktop Mode. Just make sure to run SteamRomManager to add the new launcher for EmuDeck
To add games through SteamRomManager you still need to use Desktop mode
